Trade/Device Name(s): The Ischemia Albumin Cobalt Binding Test (ACB®) Assay Verification Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the Ischemia Albumin Cobalt Binding Test (ACB®) Assay Verification Set as a quality control material for verifying ACB Test accuracy on Roche Integra instruments
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use in verifying accuracy of the ACB Test on the Roche Integra 700/800 as part of assay installation for in vitro diagnostic use
